description:
Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

From 11 herbs and spices to 150 countries, we’ve come a long way since our humble beginnings. Starting with the Colonel’s iconic recipe, we’ve grown from one small kitchen into over 30,000 restaurants worldwide. But no matter where you find us, one thing never changes: our commitment to that same legendary taste that made us famous. Just like the Colonel, we do chicken the right way—freshly prepared by hand every day, using only the best ingredients.

We stay true to our roots, but we’re also serving up modern convenience. Now, you can enjoy the finger-lickin’ good taste you crave, anytime, anywhere, with our easy-to-use mobile app.

The world’s favorite chicken is just a clics away—get ready to dig in!

LOKO — доставка їжі та продуктів, яка несеться за хвилини.


Доставка LOKO привезе свіжі продукти із супермаркетів і страви з ресторанів прямо до ваших дверей. ЛОКО працює у таких містах: Київ, Львів, Одеса, Чорноморськ, Івано-Франківськ, Чернігів, Тернопіль, Бровари, Ірпінь, Черкаси, Вінниця, Вишневе, Софіївська Борщагівка, Чернівці, Полтава, Самар, Дніпро.

Суші, бургери, заморожена риба, піца чи овочі — в один клік обирайте у застосунку!


Переваги доставки LOKO:


- Швидка доставка продуктів з супермаркетів. Вибір із широкого асортименту: свіжі овочі і фрукти – не проблема. Устриці, м'ясо, морозиво, заморожена риба — теж. Доставка з Сільпо, Білої Ромашки, а також із власних дарксторів (магазинів без відвідувачів).
- Зручний застосунок – в додатку зібрали топові пропозиції за приємними цінами.
- Доставка їжі з ресторанів — замовляйте страви української, азійської, італійської кухні. Серед закладів: Чорноморка, Milk Bar, Fujiwara YOSHI, Cinnabon, МамаМанана, М'ясторія, Idealist Coffee, Lviv Croissants, PESTO, Mafia та інші! Доставка суші, вареників, ролів, піци, бургерів та фастфуду.
- Комбіновані замовлення LOKO — кур'єр може привезти їжу з улюбленого ресторану та магазину в одному замовленні.
- Доставка квітів — подарунок для близьких із приводу та без.
- Знижки та акції — вигідні пропозиції, балобонуси з картки «Власний Рахунок».
- Доставка з аптеки — замовляйте ліки з аптеки Біла Ромашка.
- Доставка речей до хімчистки — можна замовити доставку до MINK.

Замовляй доставку продуктів онлайн разом із LOKO — швидко, зручно та без черг. Наш кур’єр подбає про твою зручність, а знижки на їжу та продукти роблять покупку ще вигіднішою. 

LOKO — несеться за хвилини!

Your smart companion for healthy food choices.

Just snap a photo of any product label – our AI instantly analyzes the ingredients, explains what they mean in simple words, and gives you a clear product rating.

Key Features:

AI Ingredient Analysis – Understand every component on the label, from hidden sugars to food additives.

Health Score – Get a clear 1–100 rating so you instantly know if a product is healthy.

Smart Badges – See if the product is:

Kid-friendly
Vegan 
Gluten-free / Lactose-free
High or low in sugar

Personalized Tips – Receive practical recommendations to swap unhealthy items for better alternatives.

Fast & Simple – Take a picture, get results in seconds.

Please note: this app requires an active subscription. All features and content are available only after purchasing a subscription. You can also activate a 3-day free trial to explore the app’s features.

Мобільний застосунок ToSim – це програма лояльності мережі зручних маркетів Сім23 та Сімі. Ми розробили цю програму для того, щоб нагороджувати тебе за вірність та дякувати за те, що обираєш саме мережу зручних маркетів Сім23 та Сімі!

POINTS ЗА ПОКУПКИ
Скануй QR-код при кожній покупці та отримуй points. Обмінюй накопичені points на винагороди представлені у застосунку ToSim.

FREE CARD
Купуй улюблені напої та їжу із обраних категорій to go та отримуй кожен 10-й продукт із даної категорії БЕЗКОШТОВНО.

ІСТОРІЯ ПОКУПОК ТА БАЛАНС POINTS
Заходь у розділ  БАЛАНС та відслідковуй усі чеки покупок та накопичені points.

АКЦІЙНІ ТА ПЕРСОНАЛЬНІ ПРОПОЗИЦІЇ
Дізнавайся першим про знижки, промоції та розіграші, які діють в зручних маркетах Сім23 та Сімі.

ЛЕГКО ЗНАХОДЬ НАЙБЛИЖЧИЙ МАРКЕТ
Будуй маршрут, дізнавайся графік роботи та перелік їжі, напоїв  to go.

ToSim - програма лояльності, яка варта твоєї довіри!

CIBOUSCAN: Scan Your BEAUTY & FOOD Products – Health Score, Nutri-Score, NOVA and Recipes

CIBOUSCAN is the must-have app to take care of your health, your skin and the planet.
Scan your beauty products and groceries in seconds to see their full ingredients, health score, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, and find better alternatives that suit you.

Beauty: your bathroom under control
	•	Scan your cosmetics (skincare, body care, hair care, makeup, perfume).
	•	Get a complete health score for each product: ingredients list, controversial additives, potential impact on your health.
	•	Check the compatibility with your skin type, specific needs or allergies.
	•	Read real user reviews to choose wisely before buying.
	•	Create your personalized beauty routine and get a routine score to track and improve your habits every day.

Food: scan, decode, cook
	•	Scan your food products to see their Nutri-Score, NOVA, and any additives.
	•	Discover personalized recipes based on your food preferences, favorite or blacklisted products, allergies, diet and the season.
	•	Easily view your scan history to track your consumption over time.
	•	Get smart flexitarian recommendations designed to reduce your environmental impact while eating deliciously.

Practical, complete and privacy-friendly
	•	No account required: use all features completely anonymously.
	•	Works with and syncs automatically to the CIBOULETTE app if you already have it.
	•	One smart assistant for your beauty choices, grocery shopping, Nutri-Score and NOVA – all in one app.

Why choose CIBOUSCAN?
	•	One app to scan both BEAUTY and FOOD products.
	•	Access to health scores, Nutri-Score, NOVA, additives, skin compatibility.
	•	Real user reviews to help you compare and decide.
	•	Personalized recipes for healthy eating without frustration.
	•	A flexible and kind approach: better choices without forbidding what you love.
	•	Everything is anonymous, practical and made for you.

Download CIBOUSCAN now and join the CIBOULETTE team to shop smarter, eat better and take care of yourself and the planet.

** CibouScan is not affiliated with any other apps

Try Premium:

Upgrade to Premium for an ad-free experience. Subscriptions are billed to your Apple account and auto-renew unless turned off in App Store settings. Any unused portion of the free trial is forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

- PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION -

Premium gives access to all the features of the application!

The subscription will be billed in a single payment. Payment is made through iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
The subscription will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the subscription. Your account will be debited 24 hours before your existing subscription ends, at the same price you paid the first time.
You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal by receiving you in your account settings after purchase.
If you pay for your subscription before the trial period expires, the remaining free trial period will be forfeited.

CGU / CGV: https://weblogit.co.uk/cgu.html
Privacy: https://weblogit.co.uk/privacy.html



We keep in touch ?
- Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/ciboulette.app/
- Site : https://ciboulette.app/
- Mail : henri@ciboulette.app - lisa@ciboulette.app

app_name: Pizza Day - смачна піца з печі
description:
Застосунок Pizza Day – це твій помічник для зручного та швидкого замовлення смачної піци онлайн. Завантажуй та замовляй піцу з собою вже зараз!

ЧОМУ PIZZA DAY?

Кількість переваг вражає:

PIZZA DAY - ПІЦА З СОБОЮ

• Мережа піцерій № 1 в Україні - переможець Ukrainian Business Award (UBA), в номінації «Business Of The Year 2023 та 2024»
• Більше 50 міст та понад 270 закладів за 7 років - Київ, Дніпро, Одеса, Харків, Вінниця, Львів, Запоріжжя, Рівне, Кривий Ріг, Івано-Франківськ та інші
• Працюємо щодня і навіть без світла
• Сучасні технології та якість

ЗАМОВЛЯЄШ ОНЛАЙН БЕЗ ЧЕРГ

Пара простих кроків, без очікувань і зайвих рухів:
Відкриваєш додаток, обираєш улюблені піци в меню, додаєш сирний бортик чи соус, який Тобі до смаку, замовляєш на потрібний час, отримуєш і ось, ти вже щасливий з гарячою піцою в руках і усмішкою на обличчі.

ВІДСТЕЖУЄШ ЗАМОВЛЕННЯ на кожному етапі в режимі реального часу і точно знаєш, коли твою піцу відправили у піч, коли дістали та порізали, дбайливо поклали у коробку та наклеїли стікер контролю.
Одним словом, не мнешся в черзі, а плануєш свій час і отримуєш гарячу смачну піцу своєчасно.

ВІДКРИТА КУХНЯ

Спостерігай за процесом приготування саме твоєї піци. Це захопливо, цікаво, незвичайно і гарантує тобі, що ми готуємо з любов'ю та уважні до кожної деталі.

А ще:

ДОСТАВКА

Pizza Day активно розширює зону власної доставки, аби ще більше поціновувачів нашої піци могли отримувати улюблені страви швидко та гарячими — просто до дверей.
На сьогодні наша власна доставка вже доступна в містах:
Київ, Дніпро, Кривий Ріг, Павлоград, Вінниця, Рівне, Кропивницький, Кам’янське та Царичанка. І ми не зупиняємось — невдовзі географія доставки охопить ще більше міст України.
Не у зоні доставки? Замовляй зручно через мобільні додатки Glovo або Bolt Food і кур'єри швидко доставлять твою улюблену піцу, де б ти не був.

КОМАНДА

Кожна піца, яку ти отримуєш — це результат роботи талановитої команди.
Наші піцайоло — справжні майстри своєї справи, які проходять навчання, підвищують кваліфікацію та щодня вкладають частинку душі в кожну страву.
Ми готуємо виключно з свіжих та якісних інгредієнтів, дотримуючись стандартів, перевірених часом і любов’ю наших гостей.

РАЗОМ ДО ПЕРЕМОГИ

Кожен бізнес сьогодні — це частина великого тилу!
Ми підтримуємо наших захисників і захисниць та допомагаємо тим, хто щодня боронить нашу країну.

ПРИЄМНОСТІ

Бонуси, знижки, акції. В особистому кабінеті легко знайдеш всю інформацію про накопичені бали та твої вигідні пропозиції.

НОВИНИ

Дізнавайся про наші події, новинки та акції прямо в додатку - будь в курсі всього найцікавішого!

Кажуть, смачного багато не буває — і ми з цим згодні!
Меню Pizza Day — це десятки варіантів, класичні та авторські рецепти, ідеальні поєднання інгредієнтів. Обирайте свою ідеальну піцу вже зараз!

Ласкаво просимо у світ піцерій Pizza Day, де все легко та зручно!

Долучайтеся до нас, ми завжди раді новим друзям! 

• Наш вебсайт: https://pizzaday.ua/ 
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pizzaday.ua/ 
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pizzaday.ua 
• TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pizzaday.ua 

Як вам наша піца? 
Чи було замовлення швидким і зручним?
Застосунок Pizza Day: що подобається, а що можна покращити? Ваші думки для нас важливі! Пишіть усе, як є — ми завжди готові до зворотного зв’язку.
А ми вже чекаємо вже на ваше наступне замовлення піци!

app_name: Too Good To Go: End Food Waste
description:
Too Good To Go is your smart way to enjoy tasty food at great value, while doing good for the planet. Winner of the 2023 ‘Cultural Impact’ category at the prestigious Apple App Store Awards, the #1 app to reduce food waste helps you save delicious, unsold snacks, meals, and ingredients from local shops, cafés, supermarkets, restaurants, and top brands—all at great prices. 

In a world where 40% of food produced goes to waste each year, reducing food waste is the #1 action we can take to help tackle climate change. With Too Good To Go, you can unlock affordable meals and grocery items while helping to save the planet. Together, we have the power to make a real difference.



HOW TOO GOOD TO GO WORKS:

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER
Download the app to explore a map showing nearby restaurants, cafés, bakeries, supermarkets or trusted brands offering good food at a great price, ready to be rescued.

SAVE YOUR SURPRISE BAG OR TOO GOOD TO GO PARCEL
Browse a variety of Surprise Bags filled with tasty, unsold food—whether it’s sushi, pizza, burgers, or fresh fruits and veggies. Prefer to get your favourite food brands delivered to you? Save a Too Good To Go Parcel packed with good food from the brands you love, at great prices. 

AFFORDABLE EATS
Save a Surprise Bag or a Too Good To Go Parcel at ½ price or less. 

RESERVE YOUR SAVE
Confirm your purchase through the app to reserve your Surprise Bag and rescue these delicious meals from going to waste. By rescuing food, you save money and help fight food waste.

ENJOY
Collect your Surprise Bag at the scheduled time, or have your Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.


WHY TOO GOOD TO GO?:

WALLET-FRIENDLY INDULGENCE
Enjoy quality meals at affordable prices, satisfying both your taste buds and your wallet.

VARIETY AND CHOICE
Too Good To Go partners with a wide selection of local favourites and top brands, offering everything from sushi, pizza, baked and fresh goods to easy-to-store staple grocery items such as snacks, drinks, sweets or pasta.

ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
Each meal saved avoids CO2e emissions and the unnecessary use of water and land resources. By rescuing food from going to waste, you take a step towards a greener, cleaner planet. 

EASY PURCHASE PROCESS
The app’s simple and user-friendly interface makes it easy to browse, choose, and save Surprise Bags or Too Good To Go Parcels.

CONVENIENCE
Pick up your Surprise Bag at the designated time, or have a Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.

JOIN THE TOO GOOD TO GO COMMUNITY
Join the community of food lovers making a positive impact on the environment. Download the app now and start reducing food waste, bite by bite. 
Reducing food waste is a key action to help tackle climate change. For more information, visit tgtg.to/claims

Tasty food delivery for everyone. Order sushi, pizza, sets, hot dishes, desserts, and much more.

YAPIKO is a Ukrainian restaurant and food delivery chain, founded in 2011 in Kharkiv. We deliver sushi, pizza and other dishes in Kyiv, Poltava, Odesa, Kharkiv, and plan to open in new cities.
In the application, you can order food with delivery, or  pick up the order yourself from a nearby kitchen that suits you better.

The YAPIKO app is the best way to order!
Super speed
Fast page loading and an improved ordering process for sushi, pizza and other favorite dishes.
Cashback up to 10%
More orders - more rewards! Get cashback on every order.
Control the time
Find out the estimated delivery time before ordering.
Favorite addresses
Your delivery addresses are automatically saved. Fill once and use when convenient!
Order history
Remember what you ordered thanks to history, and repeat your favorite orders!
It's tastier together
Take advantage of the referral program! Invite friends and get bonuses for each friend who makes the first order!
Everything is at hand
Support service, referral program, bonuses, information, all in your personal account!

Sushi made only from fresh fish, Party pizza - a unique pizza format for large companies, big juicy burgers, udon, tom yum, lasagna, shawarma, french fries, author's Royal rolls, and many other goodies are already waiting for you on the menu! Order in the application or on one of our other resources! Bon appetit!

We have the best reviews about our sushi delivery on Google and other popular services. You can familiarize yourself with the assortment, see the prices of sushi, pizza and other food, as well as place an order directly in the application or on the website.

Our resources:
Yapiko website: https://yapiko.com.ua/ua/
A convenient Telegram bot: https://t.me/Yaposhka_bbot
Instagram: https://yapiko.com.ua/ua/sotsialni-mereji-yaposhki/
Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@yapiko_official
Facebook: https://yapiko.com.ua/ua/

Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

Відкрийте для себе Ricky Food – ваш застосунок для зменшення харчових відходів та насолоди смачними стравами за нижчою ціною! Завдяки Ricky Food ви легко знайдете ресторани, кафе та магазини поруч, які пропонують непродані, але абсолютно свіжі страви зі знижками.

Основні функції:
•	Переглядайте та бронюйте залишки їжі у місцевих закладах.
•	Заощаджуйте кошти, підтримуючи екологічність.
•	Отримуйте сповіщення про спеціальні пропозиції у вашому районі.
•	Прості та безпечні платежі у застосунку.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Culinara — перший український кулінарний застосунок, який перетворює щоденне приготування на просте та захоплююче заняття.
Готуй легко, швидко, корисно і красиво — незалежно від досвіду, часу чи продуктів у холодильнику. Тут не просто рецепти. Тут — твоє натхнення, це майже як особистий шеф-кухар і путівник світом гастрономії у твоїй кишені. 
Що чекає на тебе в застосунку:
Понад 1000 відеорецептів
Готуй простіше з покроковими відеоінструкціями та текстовим супроводом. Все зручно, чітко та зрозуміло.
Кухні 39 країн світу
Італійська, тайська, українська, французька, мексиканська — вибирай настрій та вирушай у гастрономічну подорож.
39+ категорій страв
В жодному застосунку ти не знайдеш такої кількості категорій: від сніданків і десертів до дієтичних рецептів, страв для дітей, святкового меню.
Зручні фільтри
Вибирай страви за калорійністю, складністю, часом приготування, інгредієнтами та навіть кухонним обладнанням.
Зіркові шефи та бармени
Готуй із тими, з ким знайомий з екранів: Ольга Мартиновська, Артем Кабулахін, Сергій Хегай, Олена Жаботинська, Ігор Новосельцев та інші.
Список покупок в один клік
Додай всі необхідні інгредієнти за рецептом до списку покупок одним дотиком. Зручно, швидко, без зайвого стресу.
Персоналізовані рекомендації
Ми підкажемо, що приготувати саме зараз відповідно до твоїх уподобань. Або скористайся новою функцією Culinara Bites — і вибирай рецепт за коротким трейлером  у зручному та звичному форматі.
Оновлення рецептів
Ми додаємо нові рецепти, категорії та зіркових шефів, аби готування приносило тобі тільки задоволення.
Culinara — щастя народжується в страві.

Усі підписки надають необмежену кількість спроб генерування запитів у додатку.

• Ваша підписка буде списана з вашого акаунту iTunes після підтвердження покупки і автоматично поновлюватиметься (на вибраний період), якщо автоматичне поновлення не буде вимкнено щонайменше за 24 години до закінчення поточного періоду.

Expirenza is an app for those who love exploring cafes, bars, and restaurants.

With over 1700 places across Ukraine already listed and new additions daily, Expirenza invites you to dive into a world of gastronomic adventures. Download the app and start exploring today.


CONVENIENT SEARCH
Find places that match your taste and mood. Whether you're craving borscht, Caesar salad, pho, pizza, sushi, or something else, Expirenza has you covered! Discover new restaurants, browse their menus, and bookmark dishes to try later.


TREATS
Treat your friends even from afar. Purchase something delicious for them through Expirenza, and they can enjoy it at their convenience. Sounds like magic? That’s because it is!


EATLISTS
Like music playlists but for food. Browse tasty collections curated by restaurateurs and chefs, or create and share your own eatlists.


ONLINE RESERVATIONS
Book tables in just a minute. Feel like a regular from your very first visit and skip the wait.


PAY AND TIP
Pay your bill and leave tips without any delay. It's the quick and convenient QR code payment from Expirenza, but faster and smoother than using a browser. You'll love it!


YOUR FOOD HISTORY
Ever found yourself in your favorite restaurant, wracking your brain as you try to recall that one spicy soup? You know, the one with shrimp and fish... and wasn't there a hint of tomato and some herb sticking out? Well, worry no more – Expirenza remembers it for you. It was Tom Yum, right? Just like that, Expirenza helps bring those tasty memories back to the surface.

Eat&Grow — це мобільний помічник, створений батьками для батьків, щоб зробити процес введення прикорму безпечним, зрозумілим і без стресу.

Безкоштовний функціонал:
- Повний список продуктів з описом користі, можливих ризиків та віку, з якого їх можна вводити.   
- Рецепти для приготування вдома з простих і доступних інгредієнтів.
- Статті від спеціалістів у сфері дитячого харчування та медицини.
    
Функції підписки:
- Додавання різних видів подачі продуктів у «тарілку».
- Формування повноцінного меню з чотирьох інгредієнтів.
- Відстеження, які продукти вже були введені у раціон.
- Фіксація прогресу харчування вашої дитини.

Чому варто завантажити Eat&Grow
- Додаток залишається корисним навіть без підписки.
- Уся інформація базується на перевірених даних та порадах експертів.
- Простий та зручний спосіб контролювати прикорм і допомогти дитині адаптуватися до нових продуктів.

Політика конфіденційності: https://eatgrowapp.com/policy
Умови використання: https://eatgrowapp.com/oferta

app_name: AQUABOX Water best app for you
description:
Drinking water right next to you — with the AQUABOX Water app
 Clean water always within reach

 In Kyiv, Lviv, Odesa, Kharkiv, Dnipro, and Zaporizhzhia, over 500 AQUABOX Water machines are already operating for your convenience.
 Each point is a modern water dispenser, available 24/7. AQUABOX Water offers a whole new level of accessibility to drinking water — truly close at hand.
Start saving from day one
6 times cheaper than traditional bottled water delivery.. No hidden fees, no unexpected price hikes — you're in full control of your expenses.
 Top up your balance through the app and get clean water from the nearest AQUABOX within minutes.
 Simple. Convenient. No hassle, no waiting.
Water wherever you are
 We’ve installed hundreds of AQUABOX locations across the country — and the network keeps expanding.
 The app features a real-time map with all active machines. Add your favorite refill points to your favorites list and always stay updated.
 AQUABOX Water is a reliable service that stays with you — wherever you go.
No waiting, no couriers
 Forget about long delivery times and phone calls. Everything works through the app — fast, easy, and contactless.
 Just walk up to a machine, scan the QR code from the app, and the water starts flowing.
 The dispensers are easy to use — even for children and the elderly. You choose how much water you need, when and where.
 Seamless in-app payments
Top up your balance anytime, anywhere. The app supports Apple Pay, Google Pay, Visa, and Mastercard.
 Subscribe with just a few taps. All your purchases and water refill history are saved — giving you full control and insight into your consumption.
 It’s not just about saving money, but also about planning smarter.
A healthy, eco-friendly choice
 By choosing AQUABOX Water, you support a clean, sustainable lifestyle — no plastic, no excess packaging, no delivery-related emissions.
A smart solution for the whole family, from toddlers to seniors.
 Water from AQUABOX is a modern, healthy alternative.
 Sales happen directly through the machine — no intermediaries, no complications. Transparent. Honest. Automated.
Support always within reach
 Have questions about your balance, app, or dispenser? We’re always here to help:
 099 264 11 22 / 067 264 11 22 / 063 264 11 22
 info@bwtaqua.com.ua
 Our support team is ready to assist with app activation, subscriptions, troubleshooting, and locating the nearest refill point.
Download the AQUABOX Water app today — a simple, affordable, and eco-friendly way to get clean drinking water every day.
 Clear. Convenient. Cost-effective.
 Water — wherever you are.

We know where you can find the flavours that fit you.  If there's one thing we know it’s food delivery. It’s our mission to bring tasty food from your favourite local restaurant right to your door so you can eat good food everyday. We'll go the extra mile to make your order the greatest food experience in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or the freshest sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodora is the best food delivery and take away service in your city -- so let's take the first bite!

Check if we're in your city by downloading the app.

SO WHAT’S THE DEAL?

You’re ready and waiting to eat, we’ve all been there, dreaming of thai food, eating burgers in our dreams. Here’s what we do: first choose between delivery and Pick-Up to fit food ordering seamlessly into your schedule. Pick-Up is simple -- you make your order and then collect your food from the restaurant once it’s ready. No more queuing, ever (our app is magic). If you choose delivery, our couriers will bring the food you've been lusting after right to your door. Dreams really do come true.

HOW IT WORKS

First, enter your address (home/ office/ treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant and place an order. They’ll prepare your food and once it’s ready, our courier bring it to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Then you eat. Food goals.

WHAT MAKES US SPECIAL

foodora chooses your local favourites; the best food near you. Vietnamese or Italian, healthy salads or food to nurse your hangover -- your dinner will be cooked with love and care. Our riders come to your very doorstep with a smile while you save time to do something else you love. There's a cuisine and a dish to suit every moment, and we'll help you make the first bite last.

ANYTHING ELSE?

Of course your safety is important to us. We guarantee secure, simple mobile payment, so you can eat when you're hungry and pay however you like.

TALK TO US

If you’ve ordered with us before, we’d want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/ teenage confessionals. Let us be your notepad.
Email us at support@foodora.se

For further info, visit
www.foodora.com/
